mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID DD_KEY, USER_NAME DD_VALUE FROM USER WHERE TEACHER_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY 2

SELECT CONCAT(C1.CODE_NAME,' > ',C2.CODE_NAME,' > ',C3.CODE_NAME) CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY C3 LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C2 ON C3.PARENT_CODE = C2.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C1 ON C2.PARENT_CODE = C1.CODE WHERE C3.DEPTH = 3 AND C3.CODE = (SELECT CODE FROM COURSE_CODE WHERE COURSE_CODE = #{id})
SELECT USER_ID DD_KEY ,USER_NAME DD_VALUE FROM USER WHERE TUTOR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY 2
SELECT COURSE_CODE DD_KEY ,COURSE_NAME DD_VALUE FROM COURSE_CODE WHERE CODE = #{id} ORDER BY 2
SELECT COURSE_CODE DD_KEY ,COURSE_NAME DD_VALUE FROM COURSE_CODE WHERE CODE = #{id} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY 2
SELECT DD_KEY ,DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = #{id} ORDER BY ORD
SELECT COMP_CD DD_KEY ,COMP_NAME DD_VALUE FROM COMPANY ORDER BY 2
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{id} AND ADMIN_YN = 'Y'

SELECT IF(CURDATE() < G_FROM_DATE,'G_BEFORE', IF(CURDATE() BETWEEN G_FROM_DATE AND G_TO_DATE,'G_ING', IF(CURDATE() < C_FROM_DATE,'P_BEFORE', IF(CURDATE() BETWEEN C_FROM_DATE AND C_TO_DATE,'P_ING', IF(CURDATE() > C_TO_DATE,IF(STATUS IS NULL,'COMPLETE',STATUS),''))))) STATUS FROM COURSE WHERE COURSE_ID = #{id}

SELECT CE.COMPLETE_YN, C.COURSE_KIND, IF(CR.STATUS='A' AND CURDATE() >= DATE_FORMAT(CR.CONFIRM_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AND CURDATE() <= DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CR.CONFIRM_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL C.C_PERIOD DAY),'Y','N') IS_PERIOD, DATE_FORMAT(CR.CONFIRM_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') CONFIRM_DATE, C.C_PERIOD FROM COURSE_EVAL CE JOIN COURSE C ON C.COURSE_ID = CE.COURSE_ID JOIN COURSE_REGISTER CR ON CR.COURSE_ID = CE.COURSE_ID AND CR.USER_ID = CE.USER_ID
WHERE CE.COURSE_ID = #{courseId} AND CE.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H%i%s') SEQ
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() LAST_ID

SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM USER WHERE 1 = 1
AND UPPER(USER_ID) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{searchStr}),'%')
AND UPPER(USER_NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{searchStr}),'%')
AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT TUTOR_ID FROM COMPANY)
ORDER BY USER_NAME ) DATA LIMIT #{limitStart},#{limitUnit}

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM USER WHERE 1 = 1
AND UPPER(USER_ID) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{searchStr}),'%')
AND UPPER(USER_NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{searchStr}),'%')
AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT TUTOR_ID FROM COMPANY)
ORDER BY USER_NAME
INSERT INTO REQUEST_LOG(USER_ID,IP,URL,PARAMETER,CREATE_DATE) VALUES (#{userId},#{ip},#{url},#{parameter},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
SELECT QG_ID DD_KEY ,GROUP_NAME DD_VALUE FROM QUEST_GROUP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY 2

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '1' KIND, A.COURSE_ID, B.COURSE_NAME, 0 POSTSCRIPT_EVAL FROM COURSE A LEFT OUTER JOIN COURSE_CODE B ON A.COURSE_CODE = B.COURSE_CODE WHERE A.COURSE_KIND = 'NORMAL' AND A.OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND A.POPULAR_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT '2' KIND, A.COURSE_ID, B.COURSE_NAME, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(EVAL) FROM POSTSCRIPT WHERE COURSE_ID = A.COURSE_ID),0) POSTSCRIPT_EVAL FROM COURSE A LEFT OUTER JOIN COURSE_CODE B ON A.COURSE_CODE = B.COURSE_CODE WHERE A.COURSE_KIND = 'NORMAL' AND A.OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND A.COURSE_ID NOT IN (SELECT COURSE_ID FROM COURSE WHERE COURSE_KIND = 'NORMAL' AND OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND POPULAR_YN = 'Y') ORDER BY KIND, POSTSCRIPT_EVAL DESC ) MAS LIMIT 0,3
SELECT SEQ, BANK_NAME, ACC_NO, USER FROM BANK WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BANK_NAME
SELECT EMAIL DD_KEY, KIND DD_VALUE FROM MAIL ORDER BY 1
SELECT CODE DD_KEY ,CODE_NAME DD_VALUE FROM CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND PARENT_CODE = #{id} ORDER BY CODE
SELECT M_CODE DD_KEY ,M_CODE_NAME DD_VALUE FROM MAIN_CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY M_CODE
SELECT S_CODE DD_KEY ,S_CODE_NAME DD_VALUE FROM SUB_CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY M_CODE
SELECT DD_KEY ,DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = #{id} ORDER BY ORD
SELECT COURSE_CODE DD_KEY ,COURSE_NAME DD_VALUE FROM COURSE_CODE ORDER BY 2
SELECT COURSE_CODE DD_KEY ,COURSE_NAME DD_VALUE FROM COURSE_CODE WHERE CODE = #{id} ORDER BY 2
SELECT A.COURSE_CODE DD_KEY ,CONCAT(B.CODE_NAME,' - ',A.COURSE_NAME) DD_VALUE FROM COURSE_CODE A, CATEGORY B WHERE A.CODE = B.CODE ORDER BY 2
SELECT DD_KEY ,DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'COURSE_STATUS' AND DD_KEY IN ('PS','PC') ORDER BY ORD
SELECT DD_KEY ,DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'COURSE_STATUS' AND DD_KEY NOT IN ('PS','PC') ORDER BY ORD
SELECT DD_KEY ,DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'COURSE_STATUS' AND DD_KEY IN ('CS','CP','CC','CD') ORDER BY ORD
SELECT DD_KEY ,DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'COURSE_STATUS' AND DD_KEY IN ('CS','CP','CC','CD') ORDER BY ORD

SELECT ZIPCODE HOME_ZIP, LEFT(ZIPCODE,3) HOME_ZIP1, RIGHT(ZIPCODE,3) HOME_ZIP2, CONCAT(SIDO,IFNULL(CONCAT(' ',GUGUN),'') ,IFNULL(CONCAT(' ',DONG),'') ,IFNULL(CONCAT(' ',RI),'') ,IFNULL(CONCAT(' ',BLDG),'') ,IFNULL(CONCAT(' ',ST_BUNJI),'') ,IFNULL(CONCAT('~',ED_BUNJI),'') ) HOME_ADDR, CONCAT(SIDO,IFNULL(CONCAT(' ',GUGUN),'') ,IFNULL(CONCAT(' ',DONG),'') ,IFNULL(CONCAT(' ',RI),'') ,IFNULL(CONCAT(' ',BLDG),'') ) HOME_ADDR1, SEQ FROM ZIPCODE WHERE DONG LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%') OR RI LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%') ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT COURSE_ID, REPORT_RATE, EXAM_RATE, DISCUSSION_RATE, PROGRESS_RATE, IF(REPORT_RATE > 0,'Y','N') IS_REPORT, IF(EXAM_RATE > 0,'Y','N') IS_EXAM, IF(DISCUSSION_RATE > 0,'Y','N') IS_DISCUSSION, IF(PROGRESS_RATE > 0,'Y','N') IS_PROGRESS FROM COURSE WHERE COURSE_ID = #{courseId}
